ygData.subject: Re: FW: [shadowknight] ht vs loh again
ygData.msgSnippet: he can t go down to 20 points and LOH. As soon as he is down to 1/4 he is dead. so he is ising LoH at half health really. My bow does 17 damage around. give I
ygData.messageBody:
he can't go down to 20 points and LOH. As soon as he is down to 1/4 he is dead.
so he is ising LoH at half health really. My bow does 17 damage around. give I
can cast darkness on him and just keep running around him shooting while he
looks stupid, I think it is quite alright.

Inos
Veeshan


Thom Shartle wrote:

> From: "Thom Shartle" <darklingsanction@...>
>
> >actually, i talked to a guy who said that loh could only heal like 600 hp
> at
> >max.. of course, i dont have a paladin char, so somebody else has to
> confirm
> >or deny that.
>
> Of course at level 50 we only get 500points HT (If they dont shrug it off)
>
> >fights once you get hide.. shadow step, hide, and shoot them in the back
> >once they turn around while looking. its right out of the movies :)
>
> ..and that would take how long at 5 or 10 points an arrow?, How many arrows?
> especially considering he can go down to 20 HP, LoH and we start over?(well
> he does...)
>
